p: Foraging or returningâ€”The decision to return to the island depends on the current females' energy stock, the distance from the colony and the number of hours already spent at sea. E wb is the energy needed for returning to the colony ( i. e. the intrinsic energy expenditure of the female plus the energy needed to travel back to the island and the energy required for two days ashore to suckle the pup) divided by the maximal energy E max. E is the current energy E seal divided by the maximal energy E max and ts the time already spent at sea for this trip, divided by the maximum time T max allocable to a trip. These variables allow computation of a probability to go back to the island ( S1E Text).
